name: Lateral Inc.
tagline: Delivering innovation with a global impact
description: Lateral adds business value through full service technology solutions. We deliver a broad range of services from design, concept, implementation, consulting to A-Z full-service solutions. Our clients vary from blue chip companies (large scale enterprise), to midsize businesses and start-ups. We stay away from the fancy power-points and lengthy meetings. We're the do-ers, we "make things happen."
